alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 06 at 5:27PM CDT until September 06 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR ITAWAMBA...EAST CENTRAL LEE AND NORTHEASTERN MONROE COUNTIES... At 526 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fulton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fulton, Tombigbee State Park, Mantachie, Smithville, Tremont, Fairview, New Salem, Evergreen, Clay, Abney, Eastman, Turon, Mooreville, Eggville, Ballardsville, Sipsey Fork, Cardsville, Tilden, Splunge and Unity. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
